The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a black and white photograph featuring an elderly man sitting on a bench. He is holding a cane and appears to be wearing a tie. Behind him, there is a sign with religious text, which includes the words "The Lord Jesus Christ WILL RETURN." The setting seems to be a public space, possibly a street or a park, with other people in the background. The man has a beard and is looking directly at the camera.
